segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting to see the mess spreading across the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to clean it up or if they'll just leave it there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should grab a mop and start cleaning, but it's not my mess to clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water is just pouring out is really gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet soon before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children nearby, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared they might slip and fall, but they seem fine for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell the woman to turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how long it's been overflowing without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they clean it up soon, before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
